## TinySynqOptionsBase.sqlite3 property

A BetterSqlite3 instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Remarks

If not provided, [TinySynqOptionsBase.filePath](./tinysynq-node.tinysynqoptionsbase.filepath.md) must be set.
